title: Delete configuration option sets and options
content:
Configuration option sets and options can't be deleted if the design is in an upgrade path, is upgradable from a previous version of the design, and the options or option sets existed in that prior version. Option sets or options that are newly added to the current version of the design can be deleted.


The Configuration Options tab is read-only if the service design is published.

To delete configuration option sets

To delete a configuration option set:

  1. From the Designer, click the version number of the design you want to modify.
  2. Select the Configuration Options tab.
  3. Click the trashcan icon of the option set to delete.
  4. Click Yes to confirm the deletion.
  5. Click Save.

To delete configuration options

To delete configuration options:

  1. From the Designer, click the version number of the design you want to modify.
  2. Select the Configuration Options tab.
  3. Click Navigate to Option Set.
  4. Click the trashcan icon of the option to delete.
  5. Click Yes to confirm the deletion.
  6. Click Save.
